Question: "What is the main contribution of the Transformer architecture?"

Step 1: Retrieving relevant papers...
âœ… Retrieved 2 papers
  1. Attention Is All You Need... (score: 0.50)
  2. MobileNetV2: Inverted Residuals and Linear Bottlen... (score: 0.25)

Step 2: Generating answer with citations...

======================================================================
ANSWER
======================================================================
The main contribution of the Transformer architecture is its reliance on attention mechanisms, removing the need for recurrence and convolutions [Attention Is All You Need]. The Transformer architecture is a novel and simple network design [Attention Is All You Need].
